long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Introducing AI Writer from Yooz, your personal AI Writer! With Yooz AI Writer, you can effortlessly write messages and replies, create engaging content, and improve your productivity like never before.

‚≠ê The main features of Yooz AI:

‚úîÔ∏è Ask AI to write content without leaving the website (works on all sites).
‚úîÔ∏è Select text and summarize, explain, translate‚Ä¶ with the most powerful AI engine.
‚úîÔ∏è Integrated Yooz buttons for LinkedIn, Gmail, Outlook and Slack to automatically detect context. and write messages, posts, and comments...
‚úîÔ∏è All languages are supported here, so feel free to write in whichever one you prefer.

‚≠ê Usage guide:

‚û°Ô∏è Install the extension and then open the popup.
‚û°Ô∏è If you encounter an error, try again. The service may be in high demand.
‚û°Ô∏è You can also use your own OpenAI API key for more custom and stable usage
‚û°Ô∏è Out-of-the-box support is available for GPT-4.

Our extension is constantly being improved üöÄ. If you encounter any issues, please do not hesitate to contact us.
long.de,es:
Introducing ChatGPT Copilot from Yooz, your FREE personal AI assistant! With Yooz ChatGPT Copilot, you can effortlessly write messages and replies, create engaging content, and improve your productivity like never before.

‚≠ê The main features of ChatGPT Copilot:

‚úîÔ∏è Ask AI to write content without leaving the website (works on all sites).
‚úîÔ∏è Select text and summarize, explain, translate‚Ä¶ with the most powerful AI engine.
‚úîÔ∏è Integrated Yooz buttons for LinkedIn, Gmail, Outlook and Slack to automatically detect context. and write messages, posts, and comments...
‚úîÔ∏è Enhanced for Github to review code changes in commit files.
‚úîÔ∏è All languages are supported here, so feel free to write in whichever one you prefer.

‚≠ê Usage guide:

‚û°Ô∏è Log in to https://chat.openai.com once, and then use the extension everywhere.
‚û°Ô∏è If you encounter an error, try reopening chat.openai.com. The service may be in high demand.
‚û°Ô∏è You can also use your own OpenAI API key for more custom and stable usage
‚û°Ô∏è Out-of-the-box support is available for ChatGPT Plus & ChatGPT-4, Yooz will detect automatically if you have ChatGPT Plus subscription and use the configured model

Our extension is constantly being improved üöÄ. If you encounter any issues, please do not hesitate to contact us.
long.fr:
Introducing Yooz ChatGPT, your personal AI assistant for all your writing needs! With Yooz ChatGPT, you can write messages and replies effortlessly, create engaging content, and improve your productivity like never before.

Select text and let Yooz ChatGPT explain, summarize, translate, or edit it for you. Plus, with our extended features for LinkedIn, Gmail, and soon Outlook, you can write posts, comments, emails, and messages quickly and easily.

Say goodbye to writer's block and hello to Yooz ChatGPT. Let our advanced AI technology guide you through your writing journey and make your words come to life.

Get Yooz ChatGPT today and take your writing to the next level!
